# oneprovider_vm_size (Data Source)

Retrieve VM size information

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    oneprovider = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/MadJlzz/oneprovider"
    }
  }
}

provider "oneprovider" {}

data "oneprovider_vm_size" "dev" {
  name = "01d20c1-2"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Filter by name

### Read-Only

- `cores` (String) Number of CPU core available on the VM
- `disk` (String) Disk storage size in GB
- `id` (String) Size ID
- `ram` (String) RAM available in MB
- `type` (String) Type definition
